resources.string: Roster on Wheels(ROW) is a Rotary International® Official Licensee mobile app.\nROW provides one stop solution for connectivity between Rotarians of the club and across the Globe.\nIt is conceptualized and developed by Kaizen Infotech Solutions Pvt. Ltd., Mumbai, India.
Please ensure the mobile number entered is as per RI records.\n\nIf entered number is correct,Please contact your club admin or mail us at support@rotaryindia.org.
This Application is only for Rotarians in India.
We are sorry for inconvenience. Something went wrong.
Loading updates from Cloud.\n Please wait...

Every Member and their family will be able to use ROW once the club subscribes to Roster On Wheels.

The Registered Mobile Number in your club is the unique identifier in ROW.

Family Members can access ROW once their
Credentials are Registered.

Please use your mobile number that is registered with Rotary International to log in.

Every Rotarian and their family members will be able to use ROW.
Family members can access ROW once their credentials are registered.
One Time Password will be sent to this number.
Rotary India Mobile Application is only\nfor Rotarians
This feature allows you to search any Rotarian\n from \'Roster on Wheels\' subscribed clubs.

Please enter your feedback here.
This feedback will be sent to the 
Rotary India Team.
Your suggestions are really appreciated!"
This place is reserved for Clubs to show their citation points
Something went wrong. Please try again after sometime.

A limit of 500 beneficiaries has been set for each project. As this project has more than 500 beneficiaries,it will be sent to the Zonal Head of Rotary India for approval. Your project will be added with 500 beneficiaries at the moment. Once the zonal head approves your project, the beneficiaries will be updated as per your request. Click on confirm to continue or cancel to edit the number of beneficiaries
Your Balance SMS Count is zero. Please recharge.
In Club Service, post your Club\'s internal events.
Please post all the Club Meetings executed by your club. The content posted here will be displayed in the Club monthly report , District Website and ROW integrated Club website
In Rotary Service post all Rotary Service projects. The content posted in Rotary Service will be displayed to all ROW users globally.
Please post all the Service Projects executed by your club. The content posted here will be displayed in District website , Club Monthly Report and ROW integrated Club website.
In District Event, post your District\'s internal events.
Please post all the Events executed by your District. The content posted here will be displayed on the District website.
In District Project post all district projects. The content posted in District Project will be displayed to all ROW users globally.
Please post all the Projects executed by your District. The content posted here will be displayed on the District website.

Showcase the good deeds done by you to the world. Rotary Clubs across the globe conduct amazing Social Welfare Projects. Don’t let your Presidential year be forgotten by the people around you. Let us help you in keeping a lifelong data bank of all your accomplishments as President.

Communication within a club is really important to ensure smooth functioning, Increasing Engagement and Participation of members and in making your club a successful one. ROW helps you in staying in touch with all your members on the go. Send out Announcements and Notifications regarding upcoming and completed events and Monthly Bulletins. Stay in touch with your members with our Offline Club Directory.

Manage your club more efficiently and in an organised manner with our E-Governance Features. Let it be the RSVP for your Club Events, Collection of Dues, Monthly Reports that you submit to the district or the OCV of your club. We have a solution for all your problems. Save huge amounts of money and time by switching from physical documentation and manual processes to our Digital Platform.

One of the biggest advantages of using ROW is that we are exclusively linked with the Rotary India website. Every time you upload a project on ROW, it gets uploaded on the RI website immediately. This helps in highlighting your Club’s Projects all across the country.

ARE YOU A VIBRANT ROTARY CLUB … OR JUST ANOTHER ROTARY CLUB? THE KEY IS COMMUNICATION … Help Rotarians stay in touch with what’s happening in the club and beyond. In this digital age, you cannot do without your own club website. An effective website must showcase the good that you do and present a live profile to the world outside. Here comes ROWeb a -integrated service that builds your club website, automatically updates your profiles, programs and projects, and helps your club stay in tune with the times.
Please fill the details below.You will be contacted by a Rotary club near you soon.

If your club has a hospital, Dialysis Center, Education Institute etc. and your club keeps adding beneficiaries to the existing project, It is an on going project. It is life time project and not a project for the particular year.

Any Project that you have conducted before in the same Rotary year under the same or any other area of focus falls under the category. E.G. : You have conducted mask distribution today at railway station and tomorrow the same activity is conducted in another place or you have done one tree plantation in one village last month and you are conducted one more in another village this month,it is a repeat project.
These are just examples. Please upload similar projects conducted in this criteria.

The data I will enter is for a sevice project conducted by my club that has benefitted the community. It is not a club meeting, Fellowship meeting. club celebration or any other miscellaneous event. Eg. Doctor day celebration, Birthday and Anniversary celebration of members, etc or NOT considered to be service projects.
Please Note : The content posted here will be displayed on District Website, Club Monthly Report and ROW Integrated Club Website.
